001package imagingbook.lib.filter.examples;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterScalar;
004import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.LinearFilterSeparable;
005import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
006
007/**
008 * See also {@link LinearFilterSeparable}.
009 * @author WB
010 * @deprecated
011 */
012public class ExampleFilterScalarSeparable extends GenericFilterScalar {
013
014        @Override
015        protected float doPixel(PixelSlice plane, int u, int v) {
016                switch (getPass()) {
017                case 0: return filterPixelX(plane, u, v);       // TODO: check if we nneed to copy back this plane??
018                case 1: return filterPixelY(plane, u, v);
019                default: throw new RuntimeException("invalid pass number " + getPass());
020                }
021        }
022        
023        @Override
024        protected int passesRequired() {
025                return 2;       // do exactly 2 passes
026        }
027
028        private float filterPixelX(PixelSlice source, int u, int v) {
029                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
030                return 0;
031        }
032        
033        private float filterPixelY(PixelSlice source, int u, int v) {
034                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
035                return 0;
036        }
037        
038}
